snippet: Public Service Electric and Gas said that about 21,000 customers had no power on Saturday, either because of Hurricane Sandy or the northeaster last week.
abstract: New Jersey continues to recover from Hurricane Sandy but, about 21,000 customers remain without power; status of recovery efforts highlighted in chart.

byline.original: By JAMES BARRON and DIANTHA PARKER

lead_paragraph: Public Service Electric and Gas said that about 21,000 customers had no power on Saturday, either because of Hurricane Sandy or the northeaster last week.

headline.seo: Updates on Service Restoration in New Jersey
